DOC.brief_title: Behavioral Health Services Women Receiving Public Assistance
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine pattern behavioral health service use among group female household head receive Temporary Assistance Needy Families ( TANF ) serious mental illness ( SMI ) . The finding study use determine feasibility conduct full-scale longitudinal study impact welfare reform outcomes female household head SMI currently formerly recipient welfare .
DOC.criteria: Female head household TANF time first quarter 1997 use least one behavioral health service quarter DSM IV diagnosis serious mental illness
